Articles.Content:
I was trying to make a tent but when ever i went to the space center or loaded a quick-save the tent disipeared only leaving the car that carried it. So I then thought to focus on the tent when I quick-save (I'd bin focusing on the car before) but when I loaded in I was a class E asteroid desoverd 15 days ago game time!

I reloaded again and it did the same thing and I was recording by thenhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XWaYTJCEQ_M  I reload the save again half way through the video. 

Hope it makes you all laugh, though as you can tell i didn't add any music like I usually do because I didn't want to edit anything, and i wanted to share this as soon as i could because I really want to finish my tent!

That happens to me often when I quickload a save in-flight, and the save itself is saved in space center where there's no ship in focus. In that case it will fly your first ship in your save, and that could be an asteroid.

Yeah, that happened to me in a tutorial mission once when 1.0 came out... Here: https://youtu.be/cvZWbEEyze4?t=29m23s
Apart from the fact that the tutorials were bugged out like hell in general.

Huh, interesting. I din't think the game allowed you to focus an asteriod, It's bin a long time since I've klawed one.

Thanks for replying!
